original_text: Do you have the same power to do great things as I have? Can you speak with a voice as loud as thunder? I can! Do you have the same power to do great things as I have?
korean_text: 네가 하나님처럼 능력이 있느냐 하나님처럼 천둥 소리를 내겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Do you have the same power
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나와 같은 능력을 가지고 있는가

sentences.original_text: to do great things as I have?
sentences.korean_translation: 나처럼 위대한 일을 할 수 있는가?

sentences.original_text: Can you speak with a voice
Do you have the same power
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나와 같은 능력을 가지고 있는가

sentences.original_text: to do great things as I have?
sentences.korean_translation: 나처럼 위대한 일을 할 수 있는가?
